text: Winter Storm Warning issued in Maine ahead of a spring snowstorm More stories from [WMTW](/@WMTW) Join the flipboard community Discover, collect, and share stories for all your interests [Sign up](/signup) More stories from [Weather](/topic/weather) [Researchers Finally Uncover What Wiped Out The Mayan Civilization](/topic/weather/researchers-finally-uncover-what-wiped-out-the-mayan-civilization/a-jrkbOejrQk2G0ptR7hccSg%3Aa%3A23262436-fcc81465ec%2Fallthatsinteresting.com) The study's analysis revealed that a huge decrease in annual rainfall and a drop in humidity contributed to the drought that ended Mayan … [Spring training roundup: Ryan Vilade, Tigers rally past Phillies](/topic/weather/spring-training-roundup-ryan-vilade-tigers-rally-past-phillies/a-qqMY7Po8Soq3TzrWEGCIjw%3Aa%3A1921442233-8550e65ffb%2Fyardbarker.com) Ryan Vilade belted a two-run home run in the top of the ninth inning to cap a four-run comeback and deliver the Detroit Tigers a 4-3 win over the … [‘How incredible;’ Logan Co. dispatchers share how volunteers are helping the community recover](/topic/weather/how-incredible-logan-co-dispatchers-share-how-volunteers-are-helping-the-comm/a-0gBarDnvRQKGwEh8qR2x1w%3Aa%3A3408231782-a6ec1bc4e9%2Fwhio.com) It’s been over a week since a deadly EF-3 tornado ripped through Logan County and volunteers are still working hard to help the community.The storm …
